normalised: Social Media and Influencer Marketing: Follower Analytics Taking Center Stage

unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Follower Analytics Taking Center Stage**
normalised: Are your Insta followers real, ya? Influencer marketing in India is booming, from Delhi to Dindigul, but brands are wising up. Follower analytics are the new cool kid on the block, and for good reason. No more paying rupee fifty thousand to an influencer with eighty percent fake followers from some random bot farm!

unnormalised: Are your Insta followers real, ya? Influencer marketing in India is booming, from Delhi to Dindigul, but brands are wising up. Follower analytics are the new cool kid on the block, and for good reason. No more paying Rs. 50,000 to an influencer with 80% fake followers from some random bot farm!
normalised: Companies like 'Desi Delights' are now demanding in-depth reports. Doctor Sharma at I I M-Bangalore even says it's a "must-have" for R O I measurement. Expect to see more focus on engagement rates (likes, comments, shares) and audience demographics (age, location – even if they prefer biryani over butter chicken!).

unnormalised: Companies like 'Desi Delights' are now demanding in-depth reports. Dr. Sharma at IIM-Bangalore even says it's a "must-have" for ROI measurement. Expect to see more focus on engagement rates (likes, comments, shares) and audience demographics (age, location – even if they prefer biryani over butter chicken!).
normalised: Tools are popping up like mushrooms after the monsoon, offering insights down to the pin code level. Some even analyze if followers live in tiny five hundred square feet apartments and whether their profiles are just filled with generic travel pics. Authentic reach is the name of the game, bhai! Gone are the days of fooling brands with inflated numbers. This Diwali, smart brands are checking analytics first.
